channel.title: uninstallation of 7zip lead to missing Whonix meta package
channel.description:
I revceived this message from whonix check today. Did I accidentally delete something important? Show I be worrying?
If possible, how do I check what did am I missing and what to do to reinstall it? thanks for reading
============= message ==================
p, li { white-space: pre-wrap; }
WARNING: Whonix Meta Packages Test Result: Whonix-Workstation detected, but the meta package whonix-workstation is not installed. Did you accidentally uninstall it? See also: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix_Debian_Packages If you know what you are doing, feel free to disable this check. Create a file /etc/whonix.d/50_whonixcheck_user and add: whonixcheck_skip_functions+=" check_packages "
==============================

item.title: uninstallation of 7zip lead to missing Whonix meta package
item.dc:creator: tahapely1
item.description:
I revceived this message from whonix check today. Did I accidentally delete something important? Show I be worrying?

If possible, how do I check what did am I missing and what to do to reinstall it? thanks for reading

============= message ==================

p, li { white-space: pre-wrap; }

WARNING: Whonix Meta Packages Test Result: Whonix-Workstation detected, but the meta package whonix-workstation is not installed. Did you accidentally uninstall it?
See also: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix_Debian_Packages
If you know what you are doing, feel free to disable this check. Create a file /etc/whonix.d/50_whonixcheck_user and add:
whonixcheck_skip_functions+=" check_packages "

==============================

Read full topic

item.title: uninstallation of 7zip lead to missing Whonix meta package
item.dc:creator: simi
item.description:
Is there a reason this happens to remove whonix-gateway which is not related to p7zip?

Same thing happened to apparmor where removing it meant removing almost all default whonix dependencies and components.

Read full topic
item.source: uninstallation of 7zip lead to missing Whonix meta package

item.title: uninstallation of 7zip lead to missing Whonix meta package
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Most likely, yes.

sudo apt-get remove p7zip-full
Reading package lists... Done
Building dependency tree
Reading state information... Done
The following packages will be REMOVED:
  anon-shared-desktop-kde p7zip-full whonix-gateway
